html:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html xmlns:py="http://genshi.edgewall.org/" lang="en">
<body><py:if test="is_corp_report">
Телефон ${phone_number} сотрудника ${corp_user_fullname}
</py:if>
Дата: ${date} в ${time}
Цена: ${cost_sign}
От: ${src_pt}
До: ${dst_pt}
Карта: ${maps_url}
Тариф: ${tariff}
Время в пути: ${ride_time}
Расстояние: ${ride_dist}
Парк: ${park_name} ${park_phone}
Водитель: ${driver_name} ${driver_phone}
Машина: ${car_color} ${car_model} ${car_number}<py:if test="not is_corp_report">
Код подтверждения: ${confirmation_code}
</py:if>
Время окончания поездки: ${finish_transporting_time}
Время начала поездки: ${start_transporting_time}
<py:if test="payment_method_cash">Способ оплаты: ${cash_payment_phrase}
</py:if><py:if test="payment_method_card">Номер карты: ${card_payment_phrase} (${card_payment_phrase2})
</py:if><py:if test="payment_method_corp">Способ оплаты: ${corp_payment_phrase}
</py:if><py:if test="payment_method_apple_pay">Способ оплаты: ${apple_pay_payment_phrase}
</py:if><py:if test="payment_method_google_pay">Способ оплаты: ${google_pay_payment_phrase}
</py:if><py:if test="show_user_fullname">${user_fullname_title}: ${user_fullname_stub}
</py:if><py:if test="show_fare_with_vat_only">${ride_cost_title} ${tax_hint_title}: ${total_cost_sign}
</py:if></body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html xmlns:py="http://genshi.edgewall.org/" lang="en">
<body>
${point_a}
<py:if test="is_corp_report">
Телефон ${phone_number} сотрудника ${corp_user_fullname}
</py:if>
Дата: ${date} в ${time}
Цена: ${cost_sign}
От: ${src_pt}
До: ${dst_pt}
Карта: ${maps_url}
Тариф: ${tariff}
Время в пути: ${ride_time}
Расстояние: ${ride_dist}
Парк: ${park_name} ${park_phone}
Водитель: ${driver_name} ${driver_phone}
Машина: ${car_color} ${car_model} ${car_number}<py:if test="not is_corp_report">
Код подтверждения: ${confirmation_code}
</py:if>
Время окончания поездки: ${finish_transporting_time}
Время начала поездки: ${start_transporting_time}
<py:if test="payment_method_cash">Способ оплаты: ${cash_payment_phrase}
</py:if><py:if test="payment_method_card">Номер карты: ${card_payment_phrase}
</py:if><py:if test="payment_method_corp">Способ оплаты: ${corp_payment_phrase}
</py:if><py:if test="payment_method_apple_pay">Способ оплаты: ${apple_pay_payment_phrase}
</py:if><py:if test="payment_method_google_pay">Способ оплаты: ${google_pay_payment_phrase}
</py:if><py:if test="show_fare_with_vat_only">${ride_cost_title} ${tax_hint_title}: ${total_cost_sign}
</py:if>${date_title}
${unp_title}
${legal_address_title}
${user_fullname_title}: ${user_fullname_stub}
</body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html xmlns:py="http://genshi.edgewall.org/" lang="en">
<body>
overridden
<py:if test="tips">Чаевые: ${tips_sign}</py:if>
Полная стоимость: ${total_cost_sign}
<py:if test="vat">НДС: ${vat_sign}
</py:if><py:if test="is_corp_report">
Телефон ${phone_number} сотрудника ${corp_user_fullname}
</py:if>
Адрес парка: ${park_legal_address}
Дата: ${date} в ${time}
Цена: ${cost_sign}
От: ${src_pt}
До: ${dst_pt}
Карта: ${maps_url}
Тариф: ${tariff}
Время в пути: ${ride_time}
Расстояние: ${ride_dist_round}
Парк: ${park_name} ${park_phone}
Водитель: ${driver_name} ${driver_phone}
Машина: ${car_color} ${car_model} ${car_number}<py:if test="not is_corp_report">
Код подтверждения: ${confirmation_code}
</py:if>
Время окончания поездки: ${finish_transporting_time}
Время начала поездки: ${start_transporting_time}
<py:if test="payment_method_cash">Способ оплаты: ${cash_payment_phrase}
</py:if><py:if test="payment_method_card">Номер карты: ${card_payment_phrase}
</py:if><py:if test="payment_method_corp">Способ оплаты: ${corp_payment_phrase}
</py:if><py:if test="payment_method_apple_pay">Способ оплаты: ${apple_pay_payment_phrase}
</py:if><py:if test="payment_method_google_pay">Способ оплаты: ${google_pay_payment_phrase}
${total_fare_cost}</py:if></body>
</html>

pdf:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html xmlns:py="http://genshi.edgewall.org/" lang="en"> some text for pdf ${total_fare_cost}</html>

<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">
<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"
      xmlns:py="http://genshi.edgewall.org/"
      xml:lang="${locale}">
<body>
    ${extra_invoice_title}

    ${extra_invoice_doc_number}${order_id[-12:]}
    ${date}
    ${extra_invoice_recipient} ${user_email}

    ${extra_invoice_partner_company}
    ${park_legal_name}
    ${park_legal_address}
    ${park_inn}

    ${extra_invoice_transporter_company}
    ${car_owner_legal_name}
    ${car_owner_address}
    ${car_owner_registration_number}
    
    ${extra_invoice_driver_info_title}
    ${extra_invoice_driver_name} ${driver_first_name} ${driver_last_name}
    ${extra_invoice_driver_license} ${driver_middle_name}
    ${extra_invoice_car_number} ${car_number}
    ${car_permit_number_title} ${car_permit_num}
    
    ${extra_invoice_ride_info_title}
    ${extra_invoice_departure_address} ${src_pt}
    ${extra_invoice_destination_address} ${dst_pt}
    ${extra_invoice_distance} ${ride_dist}
    ${extra_invoice_ride_start_dt} ${start_transporting_dt}
    ${extra_invoice_ride_time} ${ride_time}

    ${name_title} ${price_title} ${extra_invoice_vat}  ${extra_invoice_final_price}
    ${ride_title} ${without_vat_ride_sign} ${currency_sign} ${without_vat_ride_sign}
    ${tips_title} ${tips_sign}
    ${fare_title}: ${total_cost_sign} 
</body>
</html>
